content.rendered:
Anna Naughton

Administrative Assistant

University of South Carolina

BS Business Administration, Double Major in Marketing and Management

Hi, I’m Anna. As a Administrative Assistant, my responsibilities include the sourcing of candidates from various online job boards in order to place them in roles that are the best fit for their skill set and job experience.  I am also responsible for negotiating pay rates and performing reference checks, employee verification’s, and background checks. I want to ensure a positive staffing experience for our clients and contractors. What I like most about working in the staffing industry is having the ability to provide people with opportunities to further their professional career and a positive job placement experience.

ADVICE:

For Candidates: Be honest. Be hungry for new opportunities. Stay curious and always ask questions!

HOBBIES AND INTERESTS:

I enjoy playing with my dog Scrappy. I also enjoy going to music festivals/concerts, traveling and nature.

My favorite place to travel to would have to be somewhere near the beach because it brings me back to my childhood and it’s a nice, peaceful place to get away from all the hustle and bustle and reflect.

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally. It comes from what you do consistently.”
